title: Convert Hexadecimal to RGB String
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert a hexadecimal color code to an rgb() or rgba() string using JavaScript. We will learn how to use bitwise operators and masking to extract the RGB values from the hex code. The lab will also cover how to handle 3-digit and 6-digit hex codes and how to incorporate an alpha value into the resulting string.
